products.name: Football Kit White Edition
products.about:
Material: Made from lightweight, moisture-wicking polyester that keeps you cool and dry during intense play.
Design: Features a modern fit with a classic crew neck and short sleeves, allowing for unrestricted movement.
Team Colors: Available in vibrant team colors that showcase your pride and spirit, with bold graphics and logos that stand out.
Versatility: Perfect for game days, practice sessions, or casual wear, this jersey is a must-have for any football enthusiast.

products.name: PREMIUM EDITION FOOTBALL
products.about:
World Cup Feel: Designed to emulate the performance and feel of a World Cup football, it ensures top-tier playability.
Rubber-Molded Construction: The rubber-molded exterior provides durability, an excellent grip, and resistance to hard ground conditions.
Regulation Size 5: This football conforms to the official size standards, delivering an authentic and professional playing experience.
Complete Package: It includes a football pump and pin, simplifying inflation and maintenance, making it match-ready at all times. Versatile for All Ages and Genders: Suitable for men, women, and kids, it's a versatile training and match ball for players of all ages and genders.
High Visibility Design: The striking white and red color combination enhances visibility, making it easy to track the ball during play. Durable Leather-Like Texture: The ball's texture provides a comfortable and authentic feel during play, enhancing the overall experience.

products.name: FIFA TROPHY
description: Recommended Uses For Product Home, Office, Decor
Special Feature Intricate detailing, Electroplated finish, Resin material
products.about:
High-Quality Resin Build: Durable and elegant, crafted for long-lasting use.
Exquisite Detailing: Precision-designed to reflect the grandeur of championship
Perfect Size: 13 CM Ideal for shelves, desks, or trophy cabinets without taking up much space.
Fan Favorite Design: A timeless symbol of football passion and achievement.
Electroplated Finish: Coated with an electroplating layer for a metallic, authentic look and added shine.

products.name: CRICKET KIT BLUE EDITION
description: Care instructionsEnsure washing the tee in cold water, don't iron directly on the print and don't dry in direct sunlight.
Instructions are printed on the neck label for your convenience. Country of OriginIndia
products.about:
Material - These are polyester t-shirt which are made of high quality polyester faric and are soft & smooth with thread-count. They are comfortable.
Pairing: Pair this sports jersey t-shirts with trackpant, washed jeans and sneakers. Ideal sports wear; party wear; casual wear; winter wear.
Sizes and fit - Our unisex t shirt is available in S, M, L, XL, XXL AND perfect for both male and female.
Care Instructions: Ensure washing the tee in cold water, don't iron directly on the print and don't dry in direct sunlight.

products.name: LEATHER CRICKET BALL
products.about:
PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION: High-quality leather cricket ball with distinctive red colour and yellow 'Competent' branding for excellent visibility
PROFESSIONAL SEAM: Traditional 6-row stitched seam configuration ensures consistent bounce and superior grip for bowlers
MATCH READY: Regulation size cricket ball perfect for competitive matches and serious practice sessions
DURABILITY: Robust leather exterior withstands repeated impacts while maintaining shape and performance
PERFORMANCE: Balanced weight distribution and aerodynamic design deliver reliable flight characteristics and consistent behaviour
